snippet: Doctor at SAC insider trading trial says trader knew so much detail about a drug trial, it was like “he was in the room.” | Goldman Sachs reports earnings after strong results from Bank of America and Wells Fargo. | Yahoo fires its No. 2...
abstract: Doctor at SAC insider trading trial says trader knew so much detail about a drug trial, it was like “he was in the room.” | Goldman Sachs reports earnings after strong results from Bank of America and Wells Fargo. | Yahoo fires its No. 2 executive. | Let’s play the M.&A. Game.

headline.main: At SAC Trial, Doctor Tells of Surprise at Ex-Trader's Drug Trial Knowledge
